name: Tic Tac Toe App
description:
A game that:
 . Lets you play tic-tac-toe in both desktop-view and mobile-view
 . Indicates when a player has won the game or when draw occurs
 . Stores a game’s history as a game progresses,
 . Allows players to review a game’s history and see previous versions of a game’s board.
 . Highlights the three squares that caused the winm
 . Can be reset at any step. 
. Displays Confetti on winning.
